summary: Email correspondence between Assistant U.S. Attorney Maurene Comey and defense attorneys Brad Edwards and Brittany Henderson regarding upcoming court appearances for Ghislaine Maxwell, including an arraignment and a bail appeal oral argument.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, recipient of email regarding court scheduling.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, recipient of email regarding court scheduling.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Prosecutor from the Southern District of New York sending scheduling updates regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case 'United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell', subject of the scheduling communications.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Presiding judge who scheduled an in-person arraignment for Ghislaine Maxwell.

Judge Nathan is presiding over the arraignment in Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

events.title: In-person arraignment for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Judge Nathan scheduled an in-person arraignment for Ghislaine Maxwell at 2:30 p.m. in courtroom 24B at 500 Pearl Street.

events.title: Remote oral argument on bail appeal
events.description: The Second Circuit scheduled a remote oral argument regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's bail appeal at 10 a.m., to be livestreamed.

locations: Southern District of New York (jurisdiction of the case)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell had an in-person arraignment scheduled for April 23, 2021, before Judge Nathan.
A remote oral argument regarding Maxwell's bail appeal was scheduled with the Second Circuit for April 26, 2021.
The correspondence shows ongoing legal proceedings in United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell in April 2021.
Prosecutor Maurene Comey was coordinating scheduling with defense attorneys Brad Edwards and Brittany Henderson.
The Second Circuit court arguments were to be livestreamed, indicating public interest and access to the proceedings.
